original_text: I learned this: Some women are like a trap that catches animals. Women like that are more dangerous than death. They may pretend to love you. They may hold you in their arms. But really their arms are like chains. They want to catch you, as hunters catch animals. Women like that will easily catch a man who has turned away from God. But a man who pleases God will escape from them. I learned this: Some women are like a trap that catches animals. Women like that are more dangerous than death. They may pretend to love you. They may hold you in their arms. But really their arms are like chains. They want to catch you, as hunters catch animals. Women like that will easily catch a man who has turned away from God. But a man who pleases God will escape from them. I learned this: Some women are like a trap that catches animals. Women like that are more dangerous than death. They may pretend to love you. They may hold you in their arms. But really their arms are like chains. They want to catch you, as hunters catch animals. Women like that will easily catch a man who has turned away from God. But a man who pleases God will escape from them. I learned this:
korean_text: 마음은 올무와 그물 같고 손은 포승 같은 여인은 사망보다 더 쓰다는 사실을 내가 알아내었도다 그러므로 하나님을 기쁘게 하는 자는 그 여인을 피하려니와 죄인은 그 여인에게 붙잡히리로다

sentences.original_text: I learned this:
Some women are like a trap that catches animals.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 여자들은 동물을 잡는 덫과 같습니다.

sentences.original_text: Women like that are more dangerous than death.
They may pretend to love you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신을 사랑하는 척할 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: They may hold you in their arms.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신을 팔에 안아줄 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: But really their arms are like chains.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 사실 그들의 팔은 족쇄와 같습니다.

sentences.original_text: They want to catch you,
as hunters catch animals.
Women like that will easily catch a man
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 여자들은 쉽게 남자를 잡을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: who has turned away from God.
But a man who pleases God
will escape from them.
